specific_questions: All communications with Democracy PAC II or its principals
All communications with Sixteen Thirty Fund or its affiliates
All bundled donations from out-of-state sources exceeding $10,000
All coordination agreements with America Votes or state affiliates

primary_target.reason: Sponsored AI transparency bill requiring algorithmic audits

preemption_agenda.goal: Federal preemption of state AI laws
preemption_agenda.method: Fund candidates who pledge to block state-level AI regulation

lobbying_targets.meta_involvement: Extensive lobbying, Newsom chief of staff meetings

preemption_agenda.goal: Prevent meaningful AI regulation at any level
preemption_agenda.method: Lobby for weak federal standards that preempt stronger state laws
preemption_agenda.newsom_connection: Multiple meetings with Governor's office documented in lobby disclosures

preemption_warning.definition: Preemption is the tactic where Big Tech uses federal lobbyists to strip away your state's right to protect its own citizens from AI harms.
preemption_warning.constitutional_basis: Supremacy Clause abuse - using federal minimums to block state maximums
preemption_warning.citizen_impact: Your state legislature cannot protect you if federal law preempts local action
preemption_warning.protocol_response: FOIA every meeting between AI lobbyists and state officials. Demand to know who is buying preemption.

litigation_triggers.spoliation_doctrine: Any entity that destroys or conceals records after receiving a FOIA request faces adverse inference in court
litigation_triggers.continuing_offense: Each day of non-disclosure is a separate violation under state public records laws
litigation_triggers.sovereign_principle: The people have a right to know who is spending money to strip their states of regulatory power

founder_note: We don't care about partisan labels. We care about who is buying preemption and who is hiding the receipts. From Newsom's chief of staff to Soros's checkbook, the Labyrinth has no place to hide.

metadata.verification_standard: All figures from official filings, lobby disclosures, or verified journalism
